name: Donald Trump's Real Estate Tycoon
description:
Donald Trump's Real Estate Tycoon is a strategy game developed by RedCap. It came out on 01-11-2002. It was published by Activision Value Publishing. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Donald Trump's Real Estate Tycoon is available on PC.
It was produced by Brian Kirkvold and Mathias Reichert. It was scored by Dr. Giovanni Vidingi and Péter Tolnay.
